title: Balanced Budget Act of 1997
description: Major budget deal to reduce the deficit through spending cuts and tax adjustments.

title: Economic Growth and Tax Relief Reconciliation Act
description: Introduced major tax cuts under President George W. Bush.

title: Jobs and Growth Tax Relief Reconciliation Act
description: Accelerated Bush-era tax cuts and provided temporary economic stimulus.

title: Emergency Economic Stabilization Act (TARP)
description: Congress passed the $700 billion bailout amid the financial crisis.

title: American Recovery and Reinvestment Act
description: A $787 billion stimulus to spur economic recovery during the Great Recession.

title: Affordable Care Act
description: Health care reform expanding coverage and introducing new taxes and subsidies.

title: Tax Cuts and Jobs Act
description: Sweeping tax reform cutting corporate and individual tax rates.

title: CARES Act
description: Over $2 trillion in pandemic relief for individuals and businesses.

title: Inflation Reduction Act
description: Major climate and health law aiming to curb inflation and reduce deficit.

title: American Rescue Plan Act
description: A $1.9 trillion COVID-19 relief package to support public health, local governments, and individuals.

title: Fiscal Responsibility Act of 2023
description: Suspended the debt ceiling through January 2025 and limited federal spending growth.

title: Tax Relief for American Families and Workers Act of 2024
description: Amended the Internal Revenue Code to improve the Child Tax Credit, low‑income housing tax credit, and disaster‑relief tax provisions.

title: Repeal of Government Pension Offset and Windfall Elimination Provisions
description: Amended the Social Security Act to repeal the Government Pension Offset and Windfall Elimination provisions.

title: One Big Beautiful Bill Act of 2025
description: Sweeping tax‑and‑spending law with major tax cuts, reductions in Medicaid, food assistance, and clean energy incentives.
